description: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a .NET Project management component that enables .NET applications to not only read and manipulate Microsoft Project documents in MPP and XML formats but to also write Microsoft Project documents in MPP or Project XML format - all without using Microsoft Project.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
TASKS-9994
Difference in percentage calculation (resource allocation and task completion) when date = 'NA' in constraint
TASKS-18983
Some unexpected elements in XML output.
TASKS-21624
Export to XML by Aspose.Tasks differs from export by MS Project - some extra data was added.
TASKS-29652
[CustomAttributes] Cannot read some attributes from MPP
TASKS-30685
[Gantt Chart Rendering] Duration field returns incorrect data
TASKS-30860
[Custom Fields] Cost field ignores point '.' from decimal values
TASKS-33226
External tasks cannot be identified by IsExternalTask property of Aspose.Tasks.Task
TASKS-33254
Custom fields of date type that uses lookup table does not returns date value
TASKS-33336
Project Reading Exception while reading the MPP file
TASKS-33337
Could not retrieve Enterprise Custom Fields information from 2010 MPP
Enhancement
TASKS-17739
More options in Gantt Chart Image rendering
TASKS-33140
Add support for different types of TaskConstraints.
TASKS-33320
Project Rendering option without Legends on Each page in new Rendering Technique
New Feature
TASKS-33174
Microsoft Project MPT templates support.
summary: Aspose.Tasks for .NET is a component to work with Project files
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
